author: Kim Lyons
title: BBC Dad, the OG of interrupted work-from-home calls, is back with the kids
description: The little girl who interrupted her dad’s video interview on the BBC in 2017 made a guest appearance (again) as her parents talked about working from home with kids in South Korea during the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
P.S. kids interrupting video calls are very good and we love them
Marion Kelly is back and still stealing her dads thunder in live BBC interviews. The OG of interrupting a work-from-home parents video call, Marion and her family appeared on BBC today to shar… [+2292 chars]
